<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Superclass for all disassemblers. Consumes a memory region and provides an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// array of assembly instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a07639073d0bfe2f90b94ced7f2944596">MCDisassembler</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Ternary decode status. Most backends will just use Fail and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Success, however some have a concept of an instruction with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// understandable semantics but which is architecturally</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// incorrect. An example of this is ARM UNPREDICTABLE instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// which are disassemblable but cause undefined behaviour.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Because it makes sense to disassemble these instructions, there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is a &quot;soft fail&quot; failure mode that indicates the MCInst&amp; is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// valid but architecturally incorrect.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The enum numbers are deliberately chosen such that reduction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// from Success-&gt;SoftFail -&gt;Fail can be done with a simple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// bitwise-AND:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   LEFT &amp; TOP =  | Success       Unpredictable   Fail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   --------------+-----------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Success       | Success       Unpredictable   Fail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Unpredictable | Unpredictable Unpredictable   Fail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Fail          | Fail          Fail            Fail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// An easy way of encoding this is as 0b11, 0b01, 0b00 for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Success, SoftFail, Fail respectively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a8eb822283e8f3200ca4b2a1ba0174e6a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a8eb822283e8f3200ca4b2a1ba0174e6a">DecodeStatus</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a8eb822283e8f3200ca4b2a1ba0174e6aa537a26dac8694f2000c729a35e2ead30"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a8eb822283e8f3200ca4b2a1ba0174e6aa537a26dac8694f2000c729a35e2ead30">Fail</a> = 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a8eb822283e8f3200ca4b2a1ba0174e6aa9d693b8e530a7fa3457dece6f8951e6c"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a8eb822283e8f3200ca4b2a1ba0174e6aa9d693b8e530a7fa3457dece6f8951e6c">SoftFail</a> = 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a8eb822283e8f3200ca4b2a1ba0174e6aaabe09036b442fff9aa63ce1e844fdf60"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a8eb822283e8f3200ca4b2a1ba0174e6aaabe09036b442fff9aa63ce1e844fdf60">Success</a> = 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a07639073d0bfe2f90b94ced7f2944596"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a07639073d0bfe2f90b94ced7f2944596">MCDisassembler</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a67d53a6acc509ff577f17d00ddeac34d">STI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp;Ctx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : Ctx(Ctx), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a67d53a6acc509ff577f17d00ddeac34d">STI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a67d53a6acc509ff577f17d00ddeac34d">STI</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#aca028537d2d7a5248816fc6bdf61eeda"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#aca028537d2d7a5248816fc6bdf61eeda">~MCDisassembler</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the disassembly of a single instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Instr    - An MCInst to populate with the contents of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Size     - A value to populate with the size of the instruction, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   the number of bytes consumed while attempting to decode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   an invalid instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Address  - The address, in the memory space of region, of the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   byte of the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Bytes    - A reference to the actual bytes of the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param CStream  - The stream to print comments and annotations on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return         - MCDisassembler::Success if the instruction is valid,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   MCDisassembler::SoftFail if the instruction was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                                            disassemblable but invalid,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   MCDisassembler::Fail if the instruction was invalid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a938eec53ce08249709acf1b3ec7f4035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a8eb822283e8f3200ca4b2a1ba0174e6a">DecodeStatus</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a938eec53ce08249709acf1b3ec7f4035">getInstruction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;Instr, uint64&#95;t &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> Bytes, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e02bbea14c70bab55fbc1384e1472d9add7bf230fde8d4836917806aff6a6b27">Address</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;CStream) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Used to perform separate target specific disassembly for a particular</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// symbol. May parse any prelude that precedes instructions after the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// start of a symbol, or the entire symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is used for example by WebAssembly to decode preludes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Base implementation returns false. So all targets by default decline to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// treat symbols separately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Symbol   - The symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Size     - The number of bytes consumed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Address  - The address, in the memory space of region, of the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   byte of the symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Bytes    - A reference to the actual bytes at the symbol location.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return         - True if this symbol triggered some target specific</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   disassembly for this symbol. Size must be set with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   number of bytes consumed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                 - Error if this symbol triggered some target specific</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   disassembly for this symbol, but an error was found with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   it. Size must be set with the number of bytes consumed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                 - False if the target doesn&#39;t want to handle the symbol</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   separately. The value of Size is ignored in this case,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   and Err must not be set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a433d519ca0c3f0c4fd434168aded199f">onSymbolStart</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/symbolinfoty">SymbolInfoTy</a> &amp;Symbol, uint64&#95;t &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> Bytes,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e02bbea14c70bab55fbc1384e1472d9add7bf230fde8d4836917806aff6a6b27">Address</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Implement similar hooks that can be used at other points during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// disassembly. Something along the following lines:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - onBeforeInstructionDecode()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - onAfterInstructionDecode()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - onSymbolEnd()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It should help move much of the target specific code from llvm-objdump to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// respective target disassemblers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Suggest a distance to skip in a buffer of data to find the next</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// place to look for the start of an instruction. For example, if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// all instructions have a fixed alignment, this might advance to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the next multiple of that alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If not overridden, the default is 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Address  - The address, in the memory space of region, of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   starting point (typically the first byte of something</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   that did not decode as a valid instruction at all).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Bytes    - A reference to the actual bytes at Address. May be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   needed in order to determine the width of an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   unrecognized instruction (e.g. in Thumb this is a simple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   consistent criterion that doesn&#39;t require knowing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   specific instruction). The caller can pass as much data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   as they have available, and the function is required to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   make a reasonable default choice if not enough data is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   available to make a better one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return         - A number of bytes to skip. Must always be greater than</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///                   zero. May be greater than the size of Bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a7c1ac522bf9b5a8b411e9d78ed69e4b2">suggestBytesToSkip</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> Bytes,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e02bbea14c70bab55fbc1384e1472d9add7bf230fde8d4836917806aff6a6b27">Address</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp;Ctx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Subtarget information, for instruction decoding predicates if required.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a67d53a6acc509ff577f17d00ddeac34d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a67d53a6acc509ff577f17d00ddeac34d">STI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a596db3ee82031b268a5d5d323b6379b2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MCSymbolizer&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a596db3ee82031b268a5d5d323b6379b2">Symbolizer</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helpers around MCSymbolizer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a495c1c01a620a4f59ff21e667a90c35d">tryAddingSymbolicOperand</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;Inst, int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e02bbea14c70bab55fbc1384e1472d9add7bf230fde8d4836917806aff6a6b27">Address</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsBranch, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, uint64&#95;t OpSize,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                uint64&#95;t InstSize) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler/#a7b3f2feec2e2452107a197b7e0d2907b">tryAddingPcLoadReferenceComment</a>(int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e02bbea14c70bab55fbc1384e1472d9add7bf230fde8d4836917806aff6a6b27">Address</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Set \\p Symzer as the current symbolizer.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Marked mutable because we cache it inside the disassembler, rather than</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// having to pass it around as an argument through all the autogenerated code.</span></CodeLine>
